channel.title: Cheap pc build, need advise
channel.description:
basically I'm building a pc for someone and I need some advice on the build I've got, keep in mind it will almost exclusively be used for facebook/web browsing, also I'm not paying for it so the cheapest possible build to maximum performance would be nice
I swapped a regular harddrive for a ssd since their current pc only uses 15gb~ give or take so a 40gb ssd will give a huge performance increase and extra storage won't be needed, the 4gb ram is for futureproofing and I also included a graphics card since igp performance is terrible even on high end mobos
https://secure.scan.co.uk/aspnet/Shop/SavedBasket/Show.aspx?id=371f5caa156b4f2eb8a7c9b1e8b409ce

item.title: Cheap pc build, need advise
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

cheaper cpu and gpu. not all that needed for just mainly web stuff. i managed just fine with an ati 2600 for about 6 years, playing games like crysis on low-mid settings fine.

Read full topic
